title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.55 - Door open procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5319.55 - Door open procedures

State Regulations

When a gaming device's external doors are opened, the
game shall cease play, enter an error condition, display an appropriate error
message, disable bill acceptance and either sound an alarm or illuminate the
tower light, or both. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5319.55

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
